summary: Make over for Serana, Valerica and Harkon. Adds fangs and eyes from my BVFE mod.
descriptionHtml:
ATTN SKYRIM SPECIAL EDITION PC AND CONSOLE USERS!

I will be porting all my mods to SSE for PC, and all but DVA (because SKSE) for consoles. Porting will start in December (getting new computer) so it will be a bit of a wait, but I am planning on updating each and adding a bit more content so hopefully it will be worth it.

To impatient players and modders: I'm totally fine if you want to port them for personal use, but do so at your own risk and please do not post them. Some will be getting quite a bit of clean up to get the size down, and running the current mod and then updating may cause issues.

Stay tuned.


[img]http://farm8.staticflickr.com/7291/9431571880_9259294e81_z.jpg[/img]
1.0 - Initial release
1.1 - ECE compatible
1.2 - Added MadCat221's fanged Harkon. Removed an unnecessary edit to the Nord Vampire race to ensure compatibility with another mod I may release.

[img]http://farm8.staticflickr.com/7396/9431571902_7338e7f79b_z.jpg[/img]
Skyrim version 1.9.32.0.8 or later
Dawnguard DLC

[img]http://farm8.staticflickr.com/7398/9428803053_48fa1e7a4a_z.jpg[/img]
This mod is meant to be a companion mod to my [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/38829]BVFE - Better Vampire Fangs and Eyes[/url] mod, though it is not required and both can run independent of each other. This mod is completely stand-alone, meaning no other mods are required. This also means you can choose any of the body types regardless of the body type you are using. Serana and Valerica are made over and are now full vampires. They include my fangs and your choice of glowing or normal eyes. Because Lord Harkon's script turns him back to Nord after his vampire lord transformation, I can't change too much. He only gets the eye changes, no fangs.

[color=#ff0000][size=5]Warning:[/size][/color]
Because I've changed Serana's race from Nord to NordVampire, I don't know how it will effect her if you "cure" her. So at this point I would recommend this mod only for those that plan on keeping Serana a vampire. If you do want to cure her, do so at your own risk!

Thanks to Hodilton for putting this video together!

[youtube]Q5G3gApoU34[/youtube]

[img]http://farm8.staticflickr.com/7460/9431571936_1982e588b7_z.jpg[/img]
The mod is available in three body flavors: CBBE, UNP and CNHF. Keep in mind however, that it is stand-alone so you are free to choose the body you want even if it doesn't match the one you personally use in game. If you use UNP, but you like how the Dread Huntress armor looks on her, choose CBBE. Each body type is available with glowing and non-glowing eyes for a total of 6 options:

BVFE Serana CBBE
BVFE Serana Glow CBBE
BVFE Serana UNP
BVFE Serana Glow UNP
BVFE Serana CNHF
BVFE Serana Glow CNHF

[img]http://farm8.staticflickr.com/7425/9431571976_9424ba730f_z.jpg[/img]
Pick your option and install with NMM, or download manually, unzip and drop in your data folder. If you decide you want to change options, just overwrite the files.

NOTE: If you are currently running hellosanta's SG Hair pack, you will be prompted to overwrite a few files. These files are identical to the ones in SG Hair pack so overwriting or skipping will produce the same results.

COMPATABILITY: This mod will conflict with any other mod that changes the appearance of Serana, Valerica or Harkon.

UPDATE: Version 1.1 should now be compatible with ECE. I admit that I don't have access to multiple ECE users for testing, but everything is working on the one tester I do have. If any ECE users are still having issues, let me know.

[img]http://farm8.staticflickr.com/7366/9431571892_52f8f105b8_z.jpg[/img]
Uninstall with NMM, or if uninstalling manually uncheck BVFE_Serana in your mod list and delete the following files:

Data\Meshes\actors\character\facegendata\facegeom\Dawnguard.esm\00002b6c.nif
Data\Meshes\actors\character\facegendata\facegeom\Dawnguard.esm\00003b8b.nif
Data\Meshes\actors\character\facegendata\facegeom\Dawnguard.esm\00003ba7.nif
Textures\Actors\Character\facegendata\facetint\Dawnguard.esm\00002b6c.dds
Textures\Actors\Character\facegendata\facetint\Dawnguard.esm\00003b8b.dds

Any other files included in the ZIP will be ignored once the ESP is unchecked. If you like to keep your DATA folder clean, you can reference the files in the ZIP to delete any other files that are added. Again, if already using the SG Hair mod, don't delete files in either SG Hair directory.

[img]http://farm8.staticflickr.com/7378/9431571910_8b0d086564_z.jpg[/img]
Matching eyes and fangs for both the player and all other vampire NPCs:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/38829]BVFE - Better Vampire Fangs and Eyes[/url] by Aipex8

Armor for CBBE and UNP:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25852]Lustmord Vampire Armor[/url] by AmethystDeceiver

Armor for CBBE only:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/36738]The Witcher 2 - Eilhart Dress[/url] by Nimezis
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21125]Dread Hunter and Huntress Armor[/url] by echo 1162

Armor for CNHF:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34213]CNHF Calyps and Nuskas Heroic Form BODY REPLACER[/url] by calyps and nuska
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/36762]CNHF Conversion - Vampire Armor[/url] by souTear and Calyps

Do you love Serana? Marry her!
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28685]Marriable Serana[/url] by C0drm0nk33

Don't like this Serana? Want a vanilla Serana with BVFE fangs?
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/39951]Seranafangs[/url] by MadCat221

[img]http://farm8.staticflickr.com/7383/9428803091_cf9b773ac9_z.jpg[/img]
Hello Santa for [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35267]SG Female Textures Renewal[/url] as well as other elements
mrLenski for texture elements from [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4869]Covereyes[/url]
nuska for her Real Nord Skin mod (no longer available)
calyps and nuska for [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34213]CNHF Calyps and Nuskas Heroic Form BODY REPLACER[/url]
dimon99 for [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709]DIMONIZED UNP female body[/url]
caliente for [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666]Calientes Female Body Mod Big Bottom Edition -CBBE-[/url]
MadCat221 for the fanged Harkon head mesh from [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/39951]Seranafangs[/url]
Natilde for [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25673]Tutorial - Creating Standalone NPCs[/url]
Bethesda for making this wonderful game and supporting the mod community.

Video:
Hodilton for the awesome [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Q5G3gApoU34]Feature Video[/url]

Testing and screenshots:
AgainstAllGods
andreamkall
Caelrya
Kyerea
MACHIIMACHII
Mideus (ECE testing)
SydneyB
taikodragon


My other mod in the BVFE series:

BVFE - Better Vampire Fangs and Eyes
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/38829][img]http://farm8.staticflickr.com/7349/9349444424_a119ae9cda.jpg[/img][/url]
